Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory182.png'}
{3: "A long blast from a ship's horn echoes through the air."}
{1: '1', 3: 'Silhouettes fill my path, crowding in one after another. The clamor of voices echoes in my ears, wearing on my frayed nerves.'}
{1: '1', 3: "It's so frightening... I want to run away... but where could I even go?"}
{3: 'Father had another manic episode, smashing almost all the furniture in our home before throwing me out onto the street.'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: 'P-please, let me through...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee 1', 3: 'Whose brat is this? Stop pushing me out of the way for tickets!', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Refugee 2', 3: "You little bastard! If the Corrupted come, you'll be the first one they snatch!", 4: '18'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Angry shouts rise up from the crowd behind me, and tears of fear threaten to spill from my eyes.'}
{3: "I dash through the crowds, clutching the note—the address kindly written for me by our former butler.\\nI'm too afraid to meet the adults' eyes, but I force myself to study their faces..."}
{3: 'I quicken my pace. Faster, faster! I have to find her—'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Mother... Is she here? Will she even recognize me? What expression will she have when she sees me?'}
{3: 'Will she gently scoop me into her arms and give me another cute plushie like before?'}
{3: 'Or... or will she be cold like a stranger, curse at me like those refugees just now, or even throw me aside violently like that man who I called Father?'}
{3: "I want to imagine her expression, but I don't know what expression to expect. My eyes sting with anxiety and fear."}
{3: 'I squeeze past person after person. Each time I reach someone, I secretly compare their face to the photograph in my hand.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Not this one, not this one either... Where is Mother?'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{3: 'Thud—my body is suddenly knocked to the ground by someone in the crowd.'}
{3: 'The chaotic crowd surges forward, blocking all sunlight from view. One by one, pitch-black figures loom toward me—'}
{3: 'I scramble to my feet in panic, only for my small, frail body to be knocked down again by someone passing behind me.'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: 'Where are you...?'}
{3: 'A gentle call. A short, soft syllable.\\nIn this world, only one person would call me by that name.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Another call, as a woman in a research coat bends down among the fleeing crowd. I strain my weary eyes, carefully comparing what I see to a well-preserved photograph—'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: 'Why are you here...?', 4: '1'}
{3: "A thin shadow blocks the dim light, making it impossible to see the woman's expression. After a moment, a pair of slightly cold hands gently touches my forehead."}
{3: 'Tears erupt as a hoarse, desperate wail rises from my throat.'}
{3: 'Why, why did you leave me behind? Why did you abandon me in that house?'}
{3: 'Why is Dad always so cold? Why is he always drinking?'}
{3: 'Why did Dad hate the doll you left behind when I gave it to him? Why did he get so angry that he threw me out of the house?'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "...You've grown so much.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The gentle pat on my back and her tender touch help the exhaustion of my long journey gradually fade from my limbs.'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "It's okay now... Everything's okay...", 4: '1'}
{3: "Yes... it's okay now, it's all okay now... as long as I stay in Mother's embrace, all the pain will fade away..."}
{3: 'The warm, steady heartbeat by your ear acts like a lullaby, guiding you toward dreamland...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{3: '"Just one... that\'s all... it won\'t take much time..."'}
{3: '"Made an exception... below... passenger... can\'t stop them..."'}
{3: '"...Can\'t you make another exception?"'}
{3: '"...admission rules... one... I think... that\'s perfectly clear."'}
{1: 'AniZhuanchangBegin'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory390.jpg'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryZhengyanNew.prefab'}
{3: "I'm awakened by muffled voices. Mother seems to be talking with someone..."}
{3: 'Upon waking, I immediately grab tightly onto the hem of her clothes again.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mother', 3: "Then it's settled... we have a deal.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Mom gazes out the porthole. After a moment, she kneels down and gently pries my fingers from the hem of her clothes.'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: 'Yui, take your things and wait for me below deck.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: 'What about you, Mom?'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "I... Mom still has some luggage to pack. Once I finish packing up, I'll come find you right away.", 4: '1'}
{3: "I don't want to leave her. It was so hard to find her. I don't want to leave her side."}
{3: 'But... she looks a bit unhappy. From my experience with Dad, adults become happy when I follow their instructions.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory182.png'}
{3: "Following Mom's instructions, I pick up some of the luggage and head back to the port."}
{3: "When Mom comes down, where will she take me? I haven't had cake in such a long time. I want to order a huge, huge cake with the sweetest cream."}
{3: "Of course, Mom gets the first bite! I need to reward her for finally finding me after all these years. From now on, as long as we're together..."}
{3: "The ship's horn blares loudly."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "Damn it, this piece of junk is really leaving, and I haven't gotten on board yet!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee 2', 3: "People willing to spend their last penny on a ticket are already queued for the afterlife. You don't stand a chance.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: 'Damn it. If I could be like that woman just now and bring a kid to play the sympathy card, I might be able to buy a ticket with just a little extra cash...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: 'The ship... is leaving? What are you talking about?'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "Huh? Aren't you the kid from just now? Why didn't that woman take you aboard?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: "Because she told me to wait for her here... She's coming back down any minute now!"}
{2: 'Refugee 2', 3: "Wait for her? Didn't you hear the ship's whistle? That ship is about to leave!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: "You're lying—"}
{3: 'The ship emits a dull, heavy groan as the gangway slowly lifts away from the dock.'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: 'Wait, Mom—!'}
{3: 'Yui chases after the departing ship in desperation, leaving her suitcase tumbling on the ground behind her, forgotten in her panic.'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: 'She was supposed to come to the port to pick me up—she must not have made it in time. Please wait for her!'}
{1: 'That ship is taking Mom away!', 2: '0', 3: '65'}
{3: 'That ship is taking Mom away!'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "Stop yelling, kid. Don't tell me you haven't figured it out?\\nHaving a child makes it easier to win sympathy from those self-righteous hypocrites on the ship.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: 'Haha, that woman just used you as a stepping stone to get herself on board.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: "That's impossible—she's my mom... she's my mom... so..."}
{3: "She's my mom... so she can't abandon me again... it's impossible..."}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: 'Your mom? So what?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The refugee lets out a contemptuous sneer.'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: 'In this world, the only thing that matters is your own survival. Who cares about moms, dads, and all that sentimental garbage!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "Everyone's struggling just to survive the Punishing Virus. At a time like this, who can afford to care for a child...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: "It's not possible. It can't be true. Mom finally found me after so long; how could she leave me alone again..."}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "Heh, you think you're precious or something? She can just make another child!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: "That's not true... it's not like that..."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest01.prefab'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest03.prefab'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}

{3: "I feel like my fragile heart is crushed in someone's grip. I gasp for air in desperate gulps as dizziness from prolonged hunger washes over me. I collapse suddenly, then struggles back to my feet."}
{3: 'Mom must not have had time to come down... Mom...'}
{3: 'The woman she called "Mom" stands on the ship\'s deck, gazing distantly toward the harbor.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mother', 3: 'Humans can only move forward by discarding what is unnecessary.', 4: '18'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "That's the smart choice.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Someday you'll face the same situation I did, and then you'll surely understand me.", 4: '18'}
{2: 'Mother', 3: "Please don't blame me, Yui.", 4: '18'}
{3: 'The woman I called Mom sails away with the ship, growing smaller, becoming a mere dot, before vanishing into the heart of the deep blue sea.'}
{3: 'The retreating figure of the woman drains all the strength from my body, and I collapse to my knees like a puppet with its strings cut.'}
{3: 'Mom, why, why...'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest02.prefab'}
{3: 'Dehydrated and starving, her vision repeatedly darkens, yet her consciousness remains unexpectedly clear.'}
{3: 'Why did you abandon me again...?'}
{3: 'Why did you acknowledge me, why show the same tenderness as when I was little, only to abandon me again in the end?'}
{1: '"Humans are creatures who can only move forward by discarding the unnecessary."', 2: '0', 3: '61'}
{3: '"Humans are creatures who can only move forward by discarding the unnecessary."'}
{3: 'Unnecessary things... So, am I an unnecessary thing?'}
{3: 'Just like... an empty wine bottle, dirty velvet curtains, a shattered mirror...'}
{3: 'Everything rushes out of view as the surging sea of people blurs into light and shadow before my eyes.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest03.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/BgStoryFront12.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.3'}
{3: "What's happening?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "Kid, stop kneeling. Your mom's not coming back no matter how long you wait. Hurry up and run! The Corrupted are coming!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: '...Corrupted?'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "...You came here without knowing anything? Why do you think everyone traveled so far to line up for those ships? They're evacuation vessels.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Refugee 1', 3: "The Corrupted are coming, the ships have already left. So why aren't you running? You want to die?", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He shoots her one last fierce glare before suddenly bolting away.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: '"AHHH—!" First a scream, then two more, then three, until they merge into a chorus of terror. I am too short to see anything; only the cries reach my ears.'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The crowd suddenly reverses and surges back toward me; people push and shove, trampling anyone who falls.'}
{1: '1', 3: "Some poor souls don't even have time to scream—before the Corrupted reach them, they're already trampled to death by their own people."}
{3: "I can't stay kneeling here or I'll be trampled to death. I have to run! But people are everywhere... where can I go?"}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boy', 3: 'Hey—shorty! Stop staring and get over here!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'A boy pushes open a manhole cover from below and heaves himself up. The opening is unusually narrow—only a child could squeeze through.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryFireLiziNew.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory98.png'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.2'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.3'}
{3: "The boy's flashlight casts a feeble glow, illuminating thin, gaunt faces one by one—more children."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boy', 3: "Newbie, you really lucked out. Follow this tunnel all the way to the end and you'll bypass that wave of Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: "And what about you guys—how come you're here?"}
{2: 'Boy', 3: "To make sure people who come down here don't get lost!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Girl', 3: 'This is the biggest underground maze in City No. 143! What if you accidentally wander into an area where the Corrupted are?!', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The dirt-covered little ones excitedly crowd around the newcomer.'}
{3: "They're filthy, so filthy, covered in sewer sludge... But despite the dirt, they feel warm—warmer than the man called father and the woman called mother."}
{2: 'Girl', 3: "Did your mom and dad not want you anymore either? It's okay, we've all been left behind... Come stay with us!", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Boy', 3: "Yeah, yeah! We're all unwanted, come stay with us!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The boy holds up a dim flashlight, guiding the other children around puddles of water.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boy', 3: 'But there are still lots of people in danger. We need to save many, many more people, people just like you.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Boy', 3: 'And then... we\'ll all become a new "family" together! We\'re brothers and sisters! We can survive even without adults!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yui', 3: 'Is that... really possible?'}
{2: 'Girl', 3: 'Of course! This is how all of us have survived until now.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'The girl removes her coarse cloth cloak and drapes it over my shoulders. The boy hands me his flashlight to light my way through the tunnels.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1201.jpg'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 3: '1', 4: '1', 5: '0'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boy', 3: "We're here... This is it. Just climb up from here and you'll be able to bypass the Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Boy', 3: "Newbie, you go up first. It's safer up there. We'll cover your back.", 4: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 3: '1', 4: '0.8', 5: '0.3'}
{3: "The sound of water dripping... hollow echoes in the tunnel as my worn leather shoes pad softly through the sewer. There's light ahead—that must be the exit, right?"}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 3: '0.8', 4: '0.5', 5: '0.3'}
{3: 'I grab the rust-covered ladder and kick upward with my feet.'}
{3: 'The hollow metal pipes creak ominously—'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStoryFront/UiFightDetailMapBg.png', 3: '0.5', 4: '0', 5: '0.3'}
{3: "It's fine. Almost there, almost there. My upper body emerges from the opening."}
{3: 'Something sharp pierces my calf—it hurts!!'}
{1: '1', 3: 'A Corrupted hanging on the ladder suddenly grabs me, its five fingers digging deep into my flesh.'}
{3: 'H-help!!! I scream for help as I stumble back in the direction I came.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory98.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: '"I told you this path was no good."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: '"We needed some sucker to test it out first."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: '"Now we know. Come on, let\'s find someone to test the next route."'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryMovieFilm.prefab'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1201.jpg'}
{1: '1', 3: "The children's cold laughter drifts from nearby."}
{3: "W... why? Didn't we promise to become a new family... why?"}
{2: 'Corrupted', 3: 'Squeak!', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Ah—it hurts, it hurts so much—I want to scream—', 3: '50'}
{3: 'Ah—it hurts, it hurts so much—I want to scream—'}
{1: 'But who can I call for? Dad? Mom? Or those so-called "brothers and sisters" from just now?', 3: '46'}
{3: 'But who can I call for? Dad? Mom? Or those so-called "brothers and sisters" from just now?'}
{3: "There's no one..."}
{1: 'But I have to survive, no matter what.', 3: '50'}
{3: 'But I have to survive, no matter what.'}
{3: 'Blood trickles from my lower lip clenched between my teeth as my right hand frantically searches for anything I can grab—'}
{3: 'I found a sharp stone.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{3: 'Summoning every ounce of strength left in my body, I desperately clutches the stone, and then—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: '1', 3: 'SMASH!!! Smashing downward in a frenzy.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 2: '2', 3: '1'}

{1: '1', 3: 'One strike, two strikes, three strikes... My bruised leg tears open, flesh exposed. The cold mechanical hand shows signs of loosening its grip, but just as I sigh with relief, it savagely clamps down on my ankle again—'}
{3: 'It—HURTS!!'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLouDianNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryLineSpreadNew.prefab'}
{3: 'With my leg now a mangled, bloody mess, the mechanical hand fails to grab me again and slips away.'}
{3: 'In a pitiful state, I drag myself out of the sewer using only my upper body.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStorySuipingTongYong.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Everything is broken, everything is falling apart.', 4: '50'}
{3: 'Everything is broken, everything is falling apart.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Dad, Mom, "friends"... all those "emotional" relationships\\nare nothing but lies.', 4: '50'}
{3: 'Dad, Mom, "friends"... all those "emotional" relationships are nothing but lies.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'No one can be trusted, never again can anyone be trusted...', 4: '50'}
{3: 'No one can be trusted, never again can anyone be trusted...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Digging my nails deep into my palm, sharp pain shoots through my nerves.\\nI struggle to stay conscious, but darkness eventually claims me.', 4: '50'}
{3: 'Digging my nails deep into my palm, sharp pain shoots through my nerves. I struggle to stay conscious, but darkness eventually claims me.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'From now on, the only person I can depend on is myself.', 4: '50'}
{3: 'From now on, the only person I can depend on is myself.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yui de Lévis.', 4: '50'}
{3: 'Yui de Lévis.'}
